tool_description: Provide endpoints to compute Luxembourg taxes and contributions, as well as other luxembourg related utilities
name: Fiscalite.lu
title: Fiscalite.lu

api_list.name: ApiIncome_ComputeMealVouchers
ApiTaxes_GetMonthlySalaryTaxesAndContributions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fiscalite-lu.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/taxes/salary/monthly"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fiscalite-lu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
